name: portfolio-site
description: A dark modern portfolio website showcasing projects and skills.

scripts.deploy:worker: node -e "const {spawnSync} = require('child_process'); const env = process.env.WRANGLER_ENV || 'production'; const r = spawnSync('npx', ['wrangler','deploy','--env', env], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(r.status);"
scripts.secret:put:worker: node -e "const {spawnSync} = require('child_process'); const env = process.env.WRANGLER_ENV || 'production'; const r = spawnSync('npx', ['wrangler','secret','put','GLOBAL_GITHUB_TOKEN','--env', env], { stdio: 'inherit' }); process.exit(r.status);"

author: Your Name
